item.title: Image Analysis: Introduction to deep learning for computer vision
item.description: Image Analysis: Introduction to deep learning for computer vision Authors: Nargiz Bakhshaliyeva, Severin Hu√ümann, Robert Kittel In this blog, we present the practical use of deep learning in computer vision. You will see how Convolutional Neural Networks are being applied to process the visual data, generating some valuable knowledge. In particular, we focused on the object recognition task, aiming to classify what kind of an object (a dog or a cat) is presented within a particular image by using the notion of Transfer Learning.
